title: Blog Post 4
description: This blog post expands on the theme of reflection and review from the third blog post. While that post focused on a self-assessment, this one will expand into the area of peer review, the context of which will be the previously completed R package assessment for ETC5523.

title: Blog Post 3
description: This blog post differs to the first two as it is a self-reflection focusing on a previously constructed shiny application, the purpose of which was to explore COVID-19 related data in the United States of America (USA). Rather than analysing the findings made possible by the app, a self-review of the analysis process will be undertaken focusing on four key questions.

title: Blog Post 2
description: This blog post explores how COVID-19 has spread in South America. Following this initial exploration, a deeper analysis of the region's hardest hittest country, Brazil, observes how the virus has impacted different areas of the nation.

title: Blog Post 1
description: This blog post explores the impact of COVID-19 in Argentina. In particular, the various protective health measures introduced by the government will be evaluated on their ability to reduce people's movements and ultimately stop the spread of the virus.
